doc:
Frank Lloyd (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Frank_Lloyd_(actor) 0 Frank William George Lloyd (2 February 1886 – 10 August 1960) was a British-born American film director, scriptwriter, producer, and actor. He was among the founders of the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences, and was its president from 1934 to 1935. Frank_William_George_Lloyd ( 2_February_1886 – 10_August_1960 ) was a_British-born_American_film_director , scriptwriter , producer , and actor . He was among the_founders of the_Academy of Motion_Picture_Arts_and_Sciences , and was its_president from 1934 to 1935 .
